name: J.A.G.P - Just Another Generic Platformer (The G is silent)
name_original: J.A.G.P - Just Another Generic Platformer (The G is silent)
description:
J.A.G.P is my first ever gaming project! It may be very simple but it's my baby.

This game is exactly what it says on the tin. It's a basic platformer game but with a few puzzle elements.

The game is completely free but if you want to help me achieve my dreams every cent is appreciated (if you wish to pay go to my gamejolt page https://gamejolt.com/games/JAGP/579276).

This is only the first attempt at a game from me, Just a warm-up.

Expect more in the future.

Watch the trailer here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OYzdOEm-ZOc&ab_channel=CactusPlatypus

Cheers
- Cactus
